# GitHub Copilot Instructions

This is a personal GitHub profile repository that showcases Björn Bethge's professional profile.

## Repository Overview

This repository contains a profile README (`README.md`) that serves as the main landing page for the GitHub profile at https://github.com/bjoernbethge.

## Guidelines for Making Changes

### Content and Style
- Maintain a professional yet approachable tone
- Keep the content focused on AI, 3D visualization, and technical expertise
- Preserve the existing structure: header with greeting, profile snapshot, connect section, and footer quote
- Use proper markdown formatting with aligned sections where appropriate

### Formatting Standards
- Use `<div align="center">` tags for centered content sections
- Maintain consistent badge styling using shields.io badges with `style=for-the-badge`
- Keep images and visual elements properly formatted and accessible
- Use horizontal rules (`---`) to separate major sections

### Profile Information
- The profile showcases a journey from 3D Artist → VR Designer → System Architect → AI/ML Engineering
- Focus areas include: intelligent solutions, AI, 3D visualization, deep learning, and simplifying complex technologies
- Experience span: 20+ years

### Testing and Validation
- For README changes, visually inspect the rendered markdown to ensure proper formatting
- Verify that all links are functional and badges display correctly
- Ensure images load properly and have appropriate alt text
- Check that the overall layout maintains center alignment where intended

### Preferred Practices
- Keep the profile concise and impactful
- Maintain the existing visual hierarchy
- Preserve the personal brand voice: "Breaking complexity down to simple solutions"
- When updating links or badges, ensure they follow the existing pattern and style
